question: Recently released Wasteland Atlas-2019 has been prepared by Department of Land resources in collaboration with which other institution?
explanation: The Wastelands Atlas â€“ 2019 has been released recently. It was prepared by the Department of Land Resources in collaboration with National Remote Sensing Centre (NRSC), Department of Space. The new wastelands mapping exercise was carried out by NRSC using the Indian Remote Sensing Satellite data .Four editions of the Atlas has already been published for the year 2000, 2005, 2010 & 2011.
